channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DHS brass blasts Chicago mayor for blaming ICE chief as crime rises after ‘safest summer’ claim
item.description: Political firestorm erupts as Chicago's mayor calls to "abolish ICE" after accusing federal agents of undermining city's historic crime reduction gain...

item.title: Microsoft researchers have revealed the 40 jobs most exposed to AI—and even teachers make the list
item.description: Sorry, Gen Z: AI is coming for safe and secure teaching jobs, as well as grad roles.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Still Need to Be Heard in Washington
item.description: The mixed record of the second Trump administration and the GOP Congress on life suggests that pro-lifers still have work to do in Washington.

item.title: Elon Musk says that in 10 to 20 years, work will be optional and money will be irrelevant thanks to AI and robotics
item.description: “It’ll be like playing sports or a video game or something like that,” the Tesla CEO said.

item.title: Pro-Greenland protesters mock Trump’s MAGA slogan with ‘Make America Go Away’ caps
item.description: The mock hats were created by vintage clothing store owner Jesper Rabe Tonnesen. Early batches flopped last year — until Trump escalated his rhetoric....

item.title: Only Government Force Can Stop Democrats From Plunging America Into Darkness
item.description: Democrats created the situation America finds itself in, and only a forceful crackdown on leftist anarchy will restore cultural stability.

item.title: Pinterest CEO: the Napster phase of AI needs to end
item.description: I believe AI can benefit our 600 million users for years to come and at a fraction the cost that many associate with the technology.

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.
